page.title: 09Sharon's Day
page.content: At 8 o'clock I get up and have my breakfast. Then I get dressed. At five minutes to nine I go to school with my sister.We do all different things in the morning. At quarter to eleven it is break time.I usually stay in because I get the 'wheezes'.If I go out we play games.One of the games we play is Cops and Robbers.The rules are some people are cops and some robbers.The cops have to catch the robbers.We make up speeding tickets because the robbers are speeding.If they get 2 tickets we take them to the judge.Then we might throw them into jail. At quarter past twelve we go for dinner.At one 0'clock I come into school.We get read a story sometimes.I get on with my work.At quarter past three I go home.I play wth my three sisters after school.
